text: "Stitches" is a 2015 song by Canadian singer Shawn Mendes. It is from his debut studio album Handwritten. It topped the single charts in Scotland, Slovenia and the United Kingdom. It went to the top 5 in Australia, Austria, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Sweden and the United States. The song missed the top 5 in Canada, peaking at number 10. == References == Category:2015 songs Category:Shawn Mendes songs
title: Stitches (song)
